definition: echo/sound/noise/to make a sound/to sound/to ring/loud/classifier for noises
everywhere/all over/classifier for actions: one time

sentences.english: The cheer of the fan echo round the grind as the team appear.
sentences.chinese: 球隊剛一上場，球迷的歡呼聲立即響遍全場。

sentences.english: By the time Jesse had completed high school, his name was known across the nation.
sentences.chinese: 到傑西高中畢業時，他的名字已經響遍全國。

sentences.english: The cheers of the fans echoed round the ground as the team appeared.
sentences.chinese: 球隊一上場，球迷們的歡呼聲立即響遍全場。

sentences.english: He learned to play the harmonica on this day, melodious sound echoed through the park.
sentences.chinese: 這天，他學會了吹奏口琴，悠揚的琴聲響遍公園。

sentences.english: It was the buzz heard round the world.
sentences.chinese: 蜜蜂的嗡嗡聲曾將響遍全世界。
